name: Defend Me Squire
description:
Defend Me Squire

This game was intended to be a learning experience of taking a Unity game from start to finish. There are a lot of things which could be
improved and the game is very small. I'm moving on to something else after this but I hope this is a fun little demo and would love to hear some feedback.

In Defend Me Squire, you play as the underappreciated squire of an arrogant, rude, and dismissive knight. It's your job to do whatever he wants which is mostly polishing his shield!

Dodge arrows, traverse the tower, and clean that shield as you help the knight to save the king from the clutches of an evil wizard. Will you work together and save the king? Will you get any credit? Will the knight say thanks?

If you ever get stuck, press Left Shift to reload from the last checkpoint.

Thanks for playing!
Psst... Check out the source code on GitHub

Controls

Move - A, D
Climb ladders - W, S
Interact - E

If you ever get stuck, press Left Shift to reload from the last checkpoint.

Disclaimer

This game is not a polished, finished product. It is simply a demo and my first fully "released" game. It is missing many animations and probably has some bugs. The game doesn't scale very well so I recommend playing in fullscreen. Either way, thanks for trying it out and I hope you don't tear your hair out playing it. If you do, leave a comment so I can do better next time.
